channel.title: Siege Equipment and Poisons
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Siege Equipment and Poisons"

item.title: Re: Siege Equipment and Poisons
item.content:encoded: I went ahead and put both of them under Items for now, can always move later if anyone wants.

item.title: Re: Siege Equipment and Poisons
item.content:encoded: Posting to this thread as a way to announce that the poisons and all its subpages are complete, and as such these two pages are both good to go up onto the frontpage. I believe poisons should be alongside the items pages, whilst with siege weapons im split between items or misc.

item.title: Siege Equipment and Poisons
item.content:encoded:
Alongside the other things to work on, I've decided to quickly take some time to add Siege Equipment and Poisons to the site, which are from the DMG, since I do believe that, while they are rare, they definitely fall under the range of player usable items in the same way wondrous items and such are

Siege equipment is complete, and at the exact moment of writing this I haven't started the poisons page.

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/siege-equipment
http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/poisons
